Tap_Type_and_Enter.name: Tap_Type_and_Enter
Tap_Type_and_Enter.description: Tap an input box at position (x, y), Type the "text", and then perform the Enter operation (useful for searching or sending messages).
Tap_Type_and_Enter.precondition: There is a text input box on the screen.

Create_New_Note.name: Create_New_Note
Create_New_Note.description: Open the specified app (e.g., Notes), create a new note, and type the provided text into it.
Create_New_Note.precondition: The specified app (e.g., Notes) is visible on the home screen or app screen, and the app supports creating new notes.

Search_Weather.name: Search_Weather
Search_Weather.description: Tap the search bar at position (x, y), type the weather query, and execute the search to retrieve weather information.
Search_Weather.precondition: The search bar is visible and ready for input on the screen.
